analyzed: yid 'ong grib mas mdzes pa'i nags kyi tshal dang 'dra ba'i gdan bzhi pa //

analyzed: bar bar du ni yon tan rgyas min yang //

original: gzhan du kun nas yon tan rab rgyas pas //
analyzed: gzhan du kun nas yon tan rab rgyas pas //

analyzed: bdud rtsi du ma'i 'byung gnas gdan bzhi'i rgyud //

original: pad dang padma'i rtsa ba lta bu ste //
analyzed: pad dang padma'i rtsa ba lta bu ste //
translated: Like a lotus and the root of a lotus,

analyzed: gser gyi ri bor gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi // bdud rtsi myang mthu can gyis 'di yi don //
translated: The gods who dwell on the golden mountain,🔽The powerful ones who taste nectar, they wish to clarify this meaning.

original: gsal bar byed 'dod nus dang ldan yin gyi //
analyzed: gsal bar byed 'dod nus dang ldan yin gyi //

original: mi 'drar snang ba bdag gi spyod yul gyi //
analyzed: mi 'drar snang ba bdag gi spyod yul gyi //
translated: But for me, whose field of experience is different,

original: ji ltar ri dags glang chen nor bu ni //
analyzed: ji ltar ri dags glang chen nor bu ni //
translated: Just as a deer, an elephant, and a jewel

original: 'phrog 'dod mthus sgrub nus pa yod min pa //
analyzed: 'phrog 'dod mthus sgrub nus pa yod min pa //
translated: Are not able to be obtained through force,

original: nyon mongs de dag rdul gyi gseb nas ni //
analyzed: nyon mongs de dag rdul gyi gseb nas ni //
translated: Likewise, these afflictions, from the midst of dust,

original: rtsa la gcod cing 'di ni rgyu ba 'dra //
analyzed: rtsa la gcod cing 'di ni rgyu ba 'dra //
translated: Are cut from the root and flow out.

original: 'on kyang ji ltar lcags rnams sman gyi mthus//
analyzed: 'on kyang ji ltar lcags rnams sman gyi mthus//
translated: But just as iron, through the power of medicine,

original: skye bos bza' ru rung bar snyir 'gyur ltar //
analyzed: skye bos bza' ru rung bar snyir 'gyur ltar //
translated: Is made suitable to be eaten by people,

original: bla ma'i gsung la brten nas rnam dbye ba'i //
analyzed: bla ma'i gsung la brten nas rnam dbye ba'i //
translated: In dependence on the speech of the guru,

original: nus pa yod pas 'dir ni drang por bsrang //
analyzed: nus pa yod pas 'dir ni drang por bsrang //
translated: Here, it is straightened out.

original: sems can blo rnams sna tshogs mi mthun pas //
analyzed: sems can blo rnams sna tshogs mi mthun pas //
translated: The minds of sentient beings are various and incompatible,

original: de rnams mgu bar sus kyang nus ma yin //
analyzed: de rnams mgu bar sus kyang nus ma yin //
translated: So no one is able to please them all.

original: nye bar bstan dang rjes su mthun pa yi //
analyzed: nye bar bstan dang rjes su mthun pa yi //
translated: But through the power of the guru's speech,

original: don rnams dran pa'i rgyu mtshan byas pa la //
analyzed: don rnams dran pa'i rgyu mtshan byas pa la //
translated: The reason for remembering the meaning is

original: sde ba sbyor rtags dang rnam dbye la sogs tshig / phyi rol tha snyad dga' ba'i skye bo la //
analyzed: sde ba sbyor rtags dang rnam dbye la sogs tshig / phyi rol tha snyad dga' ba'i skye bo la //
translated: the words of the chapter, the signs of connection, the divisions, and so forth.🔽For people who delight in external conventions,

original: rin chen rgyud 'di'i don rnams mdzes bya ba'i //
analyzed: rin chen rgyud 'di'i don rnams mdzes bya ba'i //
translated: the meaning of this precious tantra is beautified.

original: blo can rnams kyis rang gis rdzogs par mdzod //
analyzed: blo can rnams kyis rang gis rdzogs par mdzod //
translated: The wise ones should complete it themselves.

original: 'dir rgyud 'bum phrag bco brgyad kyi snying por gyur pa stong phrag bcu gnyis pa'i dpal gdan bzhi pa'i rgyud las rgyud 'di btus pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dir rgyud 'bum phrag bco brgyad kyi snying por gyur pa stong phrag bcu gnyis pa'i dpal gdan bzhi pa'i rgyud las rgyud 'di btus pa yin te /
translated: Here, this tantra is extracted from the glorious Four Seats Tantra in twelve thousand verses, which is the essence of the eighteen-thousand-verse tantra.

original: des na sdud par byed pas 'di skad bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig rgyud 'dir dang por nye bar ma bkod de /
analyzed: des na sdud par byed pas 'di skad bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig rgyud 'dir dang por nye bar ma bkod de /
translated: Therefore, the compiler did not place the words thus have I heard and so forth at the beginning of this tantra,

original: de nyid du gsungs pa'i phyir ro //🔽de bas na rnal @138a * //
analyzed: de nyid du gsungs pa'i phyir ro // de bas na rnal @138a * //
translated: because it was taught there itself.

original: 'byor ma'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: 'byor ma'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Therefore, the yoginī and so forth.

original: rnal 'byor ma yi dra ba sngom //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi dra ba sngom //
translated: The yoginīs' network is bound,

original: ye shes dbang phyug stong pa can //
analyzed: ye shes dbang phyug stong pa can //
translated: the lord of wisdom is empty,

original: thams cad mkhyen pas 'di skad gsungs //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pas 'di skad gsungs //
translated: the omniscient one spoke thus.

original: zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: The rest is as above.

original: 'di skad ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'di skad ces bya ba ni /
translated: Thus it is to be supplied.🔽Thus refers to the entire text of the statement and the statement-maker, which ends with the Bhagavat was praised.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon bar bstod do zhes bya ba'i mthar thug ba'i brjod par bya ba dang / rjod par byed pa'i bdag nyid kyi rgyud mtha' dag gzung ba'i tshig go //🔽gsungs zhes bya ba ni rgyud phyin ci ma log par gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon bar bstod do zhes bya ba'i mthar thug ba'i brjod par bya ba dang / rjod par byed pa'i bdag nyid kyi rgyud mtha' dag gzung ba'i tshig go // gsungs zhes bya ba ni rgyud phyin ci ma log par gsungs pa ste /
translated: The word said means that the Bhagavat spoke the tantra without error.

original: ji lta ba bzhin du bstan cing gsal bar mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du bstan cing gsal bar mdzad pa'o //
translated: He taught and clarified it just as it is.

original: de nas ni rjod par byed pa'i rgyud bstan no //
analyzed: de nas ni rjod par byed pa'i rgyud bstan no //
translated: Then refers to the teaching of the statement-maker's tantra.

original: gsang ba bstan pa'i mtshan nyid rnams //
analyzed: gsang ba bstan pa'i mtshan nyid rnams //
translated: The characteristics of the teaching of the secret

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni brjod par bya ba bstan te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni brjod par bya ba bstan te /
translated: and so forth refer to the teaching of the object of statement.

original: de dag gis ni rjod par byed pa dang / brjod par bya ba'i 'brel pa yang bstan par blta'o //
analyzed: de dag gis ni rjod par byed pa dang / brjod par bya ba'i 'brel pa yang bstan par blta'o //
translated: By these, the connection between the statement-maker and the object of statement is also taught. This should be understood.

original: 'dir dgos bde ltar mngon du byas ba yin la /
analyzed: 'dir dgos bde ltar mngon du byas ba yin la /
translated: Here, the purpose is thus actualized.

original: de'i dgongs pa ni 'gro ba rnams rjes su gzung ba yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i dgongs pa ni 'gro ba rnams rjes su gzung ba yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: And its intention should be understood as the taking care of transmigrators.

original: ji ltar phyin ci ma log par bstan zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar phyin ci ma log par bstan zhe na /
translated: How is it taught without error?

original: thams cad mkhyen pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He says, “The Omniscient One,” and so on.

original: dngos po thams cad mi rtag pa la sogs ba'i tshul gyis ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pas na thams cad mkhyen pa ste bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad mi rtag pa la sogs ba'i tshul gyis ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pas na thams cad mkhyen pa ste bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: The Omniscient One is the Bhagavān, who knows all things as they are, in terms of their impermanence, and so on.

original: des ni ston pa phun sum tshogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: des ni ston pa phun sum tshogs pa gsungs so //
translated: This states the excellence of the teacher.

original: de nyid kyi khyad par gsungs pa rnal 'byor ma'i zhes bya la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nyid kyi khyad par gsungs pa rnal 'byor ma'i zhes bya la sogs pa la /
translated: He states the particular features of that [teacher]: “the Yoginī,” and so on.

original: rnal 'byor ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te /
translated: Yoga is the gnosis of the non-duality of method and wisdom.

original: 'dir shes rab ni rang bzhin med pa yin la /
analyzed: 'dir shes rab ni rang bzhin med pa yin la /
translated: Here, wisdom is the absence of intrinsic nature,

original: thabs ni yongs su dag pa'i snying rje'o //
analyzed: thabs ni yongs su dag pa'i snying rje'o //
translated: and method is pure compassion.

original: de ltar yang /
analyzed: de ltar yang /
translated: As it is said:

original: thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa //
translated: The union of method and wisdom

original: rnal 'byor zhes ni bya bar brjod //
analyzed: rnal 'byor zhes ni bya bar brjod //
translated: is called “yoga.”

original: gang zhig dngos med shes rab ste //
analyzed: gang zhig dngos med shes rab ste //
translated: That which is non-entity is wisdom,

original: dngos po'i mtshan nyid thabs yin no //🔽zhes gsungs pas so //
analyzed: dngos po'i mtshan nyid thabs yin no //🔽zhes gsungs pas so //
translated: and the characteristic of entity is method.

original: rnal 'byor de su dag la yod pa de dag ni rnal 'byor ma'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor de su dag la yod pa de dag ni rnal 'byor ma'o //
translated: Those who have that yoga are yoginis.

original: dra ba ni de rnams kyi yongs su dag pa'i sbrul pa'o //
analyzed: dra ba ni de rnams kyi yongs su dag pa'i sbrul pa'o //
translated: The net is their pure emanation.

original: sngom pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sngom pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: The vow is as follows:

original: sam ni 'khor ba'i sems can thams cad de /
analyzed: sam ni 'khor ba'i sems can thams cad de /
translated: Sam is all sentient beings in cyclic existence.

original: war ni de rnams kyis de dag sngom zhing kun du skyob pa de la de skad ces bya'o//
analyzed: war ni de rnams kyis de dag sngom zhing kun du skyob pa de la de skad ces bya'o//
translated: Var means to bind them and to protect them.

original: @138b ye shes dbang phyug stong pa can //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: @138b ye shes dbang phyug stong pa can // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The lord of knowledge is empty.

original: ye shes ni shes bya rnams shes pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes ni shes bya rnams shes pa'o //
translated: Knowledge is the knowledge of objects of knowledge.

original: stong pa can ni sangs rgyas rnams te /🔽bsod nams chen po'i ngo bo nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po ni sangs rgyas thams cad skyed par byed pas na /
analyzed: stong pa can ni sangs rgyas rnams te / bsod nams chen po'i ngo bo nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po ni sangs rgyas thams cad skyed par byed pas na /
translated: The empty one is the Buddhas.

original: de rnams kyi dbang phyug go //
analyzed: de rnams kyi dbang phyug go //
translated: The lord of them is the Great Vajradhara, whose nature is great merit, because he produces all the Buddhas.

original: de ltar yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar yang gsungs pa /
translated: Thus it is said:🔽The glorious lord of all the Buddhas,

original: dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag / rdo rje 'dzin chen go 'phang ni //
analyzed: dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag / rdo rje 'dzin chen go 'phang ni //
translated: the state of the Great Vajradhara,

original: sangs rgyas thams cad 'byin pa po //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad 'byin pa po //
translated: is the producer of all the Buddhas.

original: de nyid chos rnams chos nyid yin //
analyzed: de nyid chos rnams chos nyid yin //
translated: That itself is the reality of phenomena.

original: zhes pas na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skyed pa po'o //
analyzed: zhes pas na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skyed pa po'o //
translated: Thus, he is the creator of all Buddhas.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi khyad par bstan pa'i sgo nas gnas su phun sum tshogs pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi khyad par bstan pa'i sgo nas gnas su phun sum tshogs pa gsungs pa /
translated: The Blessed One has declared the perfection of the place by way of teaching the distinctions of the Blessed One:

original: gnas gtsang ma na bzhugs nas su //
analyzed: gnas gtsang ma na bzhugs nas su //
translated: Dwelling in the Pure Abode,

original: zhes bya ba la gtsang ma ni lha rnams so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la gtsang ma ni lha rnams so //
translated: The Pure Ones are the gods.

original: de dag bsrung zhing skyob pas na gnas te ri bo lhun po'o //
analyzed: de dag bsrung zhing skyob pas na gnas te ri bo lhun po'o //
translated: The place is the mountain Meru, because it protects and shelters them.

original: bzhugs pa ni der gnas par mdzad de /
analyzed: bzhugs pa ni der gnas par mdzad de /
translated: Dwelling means that he dwells there.

original: lhun po'i steng na khang bu brtsegs pa'i nang du bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: lhun po'i steng na khang bu brtsegs pa'i nang du bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that he dwells in the palace on top of Meru.

original: de la thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya bas ni bdag gi don phun sum tshogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de la thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya bas ni bdag gi don phun sum tshogs pa gsungs so //
translated: There, the Blessed One has declared the perfection of his own aim by saying, “Omniscient One. ”🔽The perfection of his continuum is declared by saying,

original: ye shes dbang phyug stong pa can //🔽zhes bya bas ni /🔽de'i rgyud phun sum tshogs pa gsungs so //🔽gnas gtsang ma na bzhugs nas su //
analyzed: ye shes dbang phyug stong pa can // zhes bya bas ni / de'i rgyud phun sum tshogs pa gsungs so // gnas gtsang ma na bzhugs nas su //
translated: “Lord of Knowledge, empty. ”

original: zhes bya bas ni gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya bas ni gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa gsungs so //
translated: The perfection of the aim of others is declared by saying,🔽“Dwelling in the Pure Abode. ”

original: rnal 'byor ma yi dra ba sdom //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi dra ba sdom //
translated: The yoginis are the net of binding.

original: zhes bya bas ni de'i rgyud phun sum tshogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya bas ni de'i rgyud phun sum tshogs pa gsungs te /
translated: By this verse, the perfection of its continuum is stated.

original: de dag gis phyin ci ma log par bstan par grub pa nyid de 'di ltar bstan par bya ba dang / bstan pa dang / ston pa po dang / gnas su phun sum tshogs pa rnams rim bzhin du gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag gis phyin ci ma log par bstan par grub pa nyid de 'di ltar bstan par bya ba dang / bstan pa dang / ston pa po dang / gnas su phun sum tshogs pa rnams rim bzhin du gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: By these, the perfection of the teacher is stated, because the perfection of the place is stated in order.

original: der 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yang bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: der 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yang bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: There, the perfection of the retinue is also stated.

original: sbyangs pa'i yon tan can dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: sbyangs pa'i yon tan can dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In order to demonstrate that, he says, “endowed with the virtues of training,” and so on.

original: sbyangs pa'i yon tan can ni byams pa'o //
analyzed: sbyangs pa'i yon tan can ni byams pa'o //
translated: “Endowed with the virtues of training” is Maitreya.

original: mi sdug pa ni phyag na rdo rje'o //
analyzed: mi sdug pa ni phyag na rdo rje'o //
translated: “Repulsive” is Vajrapani.

original: 'phyang ba ni kun du bzang po'o //
analyzed: 'phyang ba ni kun du bzang po'o //
translated: “Hanging” is Samantabhadra.

original: mgrin pa gsum pa ni nam mkha'i snying po'o //
analyzed: mgrin pa gsum pa ni nam mkha'i snying po'o //
translated: “Three-necked” is Akashagarbha.

original: ri rab ni sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'o //
analyzed: ri rab ni sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'o //
translated: “Meru” is Sarvanivarana Viskambini.

original: ri rab gtsug tor ni sa'i snying po'o //
analyzed: ri rab gtsug tor ni sa'i snying po'o //
translated: “Meru-crown” is Kshitigarbha.

original: padma ni 'jig rten dbang phyug go //🔽padmo @139a * //
analyzed: padma ni 'jig rten dbang phyug go //🔽padmo @139a * //
translated: “Lotus” is Lokeshvara.🔽“Lotus-navel” is Avalokiteshvara.

original: yangs pa ni 'jam dpal te /
analyzed: yangs pa ni 'jam dpal te /
translated: The vast is Manjusri,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i gtso bo yin pa'i phyir brgyad po de dag smos so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i gtso bo yin pa'i phyir brgyad po de dag smos so //
translated: because he is the chief Bodhisattva. These eight are mentioned.

original: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bye ba phrag brgyad cu ni /
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bye ba phrag brgyad cu ni /
translated: The eighty million lords of yoga

original: gtso bo de dag la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: gtso bo de dag la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ste /
translated: are Bodhisattvas, headed by those eight.

original: de snyed dang ldan pa'i nang nas phyag na rdo rje la gzigs te 'dzum pa mdzad do zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de snyed dang ldan pa'i nang nas phyag na rdo rje la gzigs te 'dzum pa mdzad do zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Among them, the Lord looked at Vajrapani and smiled.

original: 'dzum pa ni tshems kyi 'od dang bcas pas cung zad bzhad pa ste /
analyzed: 'dzum pa ni tshems kyi 'od dang bcas pas cung zad bzhad pa ste /
translated: The smile is a slight laughter, together with the light of the teeth.

original: thams cad mkhyen pas zhes bya ba'i lhag ma yin no //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pas zhes bya ba'i lhag ma yin no //
translated: The omniscient one is understood.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor rnams dpal gdan bzhi pa nyan par 'dod pa'i gzhan gyi sems mkhyen pa dang / phyag na rdo rjes sdud nus par thugs su chud nas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor rnams dpal gdan bzhi pa nyan par 'dod pa'i gzhan gyi sems mkhyen pa dang / phyag na rdo rjes sdud nus par thugs su chud nas /
translated: The Lord, knowing that the assembly was desirous of hearing the glorious Catuh-pitha, and that Vajrapani was capable of compiling it,

original: nga la gsol ba 'debs su gzhug go snyam du dgongs te /
analyzed: nga la gsol ba 'debs su gzhug go snyam du dgongs te /
translated: thought, I will have him request it from me.

original: de la gzigs pas bskul zhing bzhad pas spro ba nyid du bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la gzigs pas bskul zhing bzhad pas spro ba nyid du bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In order to demonstrate that he was inspired by his vision and delighted by his laughter.

original: des de gsol ba 'debs par chas pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: des de gsol ba 'debs par chas pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that he was prepared to make a request,

original: 'dzum pa mdzad ma thag tu zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: 'dzum pa mdzad ma thag tu zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: he said, “Immediately after smiling.

original: mdzad ma thag tu zhes bya ba ni bar mchod pa'o //
analyzed: mdzad ma thag tu zhes bya ba ni bar mchod pa'o //

translated: are entrusted to the gods and so forth.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: And so forth.

analyzed: tshe rabs snga ma la sogs pa la bsags pa'i sdig pa rnams lha la bsgo ba ste /
translated: The sins accumulated in previous lives and so forth are entrusted to the gods.🔽 The gods will make them nonexistent. Otherwise, merely by this rite, the body of the recipient is not protected.

original: lha rnams kyis med par mdzad pa yin gyis gzhan du na chog 'di tsam gyis bsgrub bya'i lus bsrungs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: lha rnams kyis med par mdzad pa yin gyis gzhan du na chog 'di tsam gyis bsgrub bya'i lus bsrungs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: yan lag thams cad gzir ba dang // 'chi ba'i dus bab 'byung mi 'gyur //
analyzed: yan lag thams cad gzir ba dang // 'chi ba'i dus bab 'byung mi 'gyur //
translated: All limbs are straightened, and the time of death does not occur.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is what it says.

analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i lus la nad dang dus ma yin par 'chi ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that in the body of the practitioner, disease and untimely death do not occur.

original: nang pa glor gzhag sbyar nas ni //
analyzed: nang pa glor gzhag sbyar nas ni //
translated: Having placed the machine on the chest of the patient,

analyzed: zhe bya ba ni nad pa'i glor 'khrul 'khor bzhag na sngags bzlas pa sbyar na'o //
translated: the meaning is that having placed the machine on the chest of the patient, one should apply the recitation of the mantra.

original: dus rnams kun du nad mi 'byung //
analyzed: dus rnams kun du nad mi 'byung //
translated: Disease does not occur at all times.

original: zhes bya ba ni nad dang bral pa'o //🔽yang na dus rnams kun du zhes bya ba ni sngags brgyad brgya bzlas pa'i 'khrul 'khor ji srid du gnas pa de srid du dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang nad rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nad dang bral pa'o // yang na dus rnams kun du zhes bya ba ni sngags brgyad brgya bzlas pa'i 'khrul 'khor ji srid du gnas pa de srid du dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang nad rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba ste /
translated: The meaning is that one is free from disease.🔽Or, “at all times” means that as long as the machine, to which the mantra has been applied eight hundred times, remains, untimely death and disease do not occur.

original: de nyid la sngags brgyad brgya bzlas pas gal te nad kyis zin pa yang nad dang dus ma yin par 'chi ba zlog par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid la sngags brgyad brgya bzlas pas gal te nad kyis zin pa yang nad dang dus ma yin par 'chi ba zlog par byed pa'o //
translated: By applying the mantra eight hundred times to that very machine, if one is seized by disease, one is protected from disease and untimely death.

original: de'i tshe / lus can tshe ni zad pa yang //
analyzed: de'i tshe / lus can tshe ni zad pa yang //
translated: the life of embodied beings, even if exhausted,

original: zla ba drug tu gnas par 'gyur //
analyzed: zla ba drug tu gnas par 'gyur //
translated: will remain for six months.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is related to

original: nad @155b pa'i glor gzhag sbyar na ni //🔽zhes bya ba dang 'brel te /
analyzed: nad @155b pa'i glor gzhag sbyar na ni // zhes bya ba dang 'brel te /
translated: placing it at the side of the sick person.

analyzed: nad pa'i glor 'khrul 'khor bzhag nas sngags bzlas na tshe zad pa rnams kyang zla ba drug tu tshe nur bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If the machine is placed at the side of the sick person and the mantra is recited, even those whose life is exhausted will extend their life for six months. This is the meaning.

original: gnas gzhan du ni bhag nas su //
analyzed: gnas gzhan du ni bhag nas su //
translated: In another place,

original: rtag tu mchod la brtson par bya //
analyzed: rtag tu mchod la brtson par bya //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni glor bzhag pa las gnas gzhan du bzhag nas kyang /
translated: Having placed it in another place than at the side,

analyzed: mchod pa sngon du 'gro ba'i sngags bzlas nas sngar smos pa ltar 'gyur ro //

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: For that very reason, it is said:

analyzed: rdo rje rgya ldan sbyor ba yis //

analyzed: rnam shes gang du'ang 'gro mi 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba smos te /

original: ji ltar rgya ldan gyis khang pa'i sgo bsrungs pa'i mi phyir mi 'byung ba ltar cho ga 'dis bsrungs pa'i lus las rnam par shes pa mi 'gro'o zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽da ni dug gso ba bstan pa'i phyir /

translated: Just as a door guarded by a doorkeeper does not open, so the body guarded by this rite does not allow consciousness to depart.

analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /

analyzed: gzhan yang las ni bshad par bya //

original: zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: zhes bya bar sbyar ro //

original: gzhan yang bdag gi dbugs dag ni //
analyzed: gzhan yang bdag gi dbugs dag ni //

original: der ni rab tu brtag par bya //
analyzed: der ni rab tu brtag par bya //

analyzed: zhes bya ba la bdag _gi dbugs ni bdag nyid kyi dbugs rgyu ba'o //
translated: Here, one's own breath is one's own respiration.

analyzed: der ni zhes bya ba ni dug gso ba la'o //

analyzed: rab tu brtag par bya zhes bya ba ni dpyad pa la 'bad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Thoroughly examined means one should strive in analysis.

analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: For that very reason, it is said:

analyzed: dbugs kyi gnas ni mtshungs par ni //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bdag gi dbugs sna sgo'i phyogs gang nas rgyu ba'i phyogs de nas gal te pho nya smra bar byed na /

analyzed: de'i tshe dbugs dang gnas mtshungs pa'o //

original: thams cad 'grub par gsungs pa yin //

translated: In order to clarify that, it is said:🔽On the right, on the right,

analyzed: g-yas la g-yas su gnas pa zhes bya ba ni bdag gi dbugs sna sgo g-yas nas rgyu ba'i tshe /

original: dbugs dang gnas mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: dbugs dang gnas mtshungs pa'o //

original: thams cad 'grub pa nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: thams cad 'grub pa nyid du 'gyur //

original: zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //

analyzed: spang bar bya ba bstan pa'i phyir //

original: grub pa ring bar mtshon par bya //
analyzed: grub pa ring bar mtshon par bya //

analyzed: zhes @156a * // bya ba smos te /

analyzed: 'dri ba zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: dbugs kyis stong pa'i sna sgor g-yas pa zhes bya ba ni don to // dngos grub ring bar mtshon par bya //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //

analyzed: ces bya ba la /

analyzed: smram ngo // nam mtshang dag tu ni hmram ngo // snying gar ni ymram ngo //

analyzed: lte bar ni kshmam ngo //

original: kha dog dkar por bsams pa yi //
analyzed: kha dog dkar por bsams pa yi //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sa bon de dag kha dog sna tshogs yin mod kyi /

analyzed: sa bon rnams kyis yu yid dug dbrog / ces yu bya ba la /

analyzed: yid yu dug ces bya ba ryu ni dug rnams rang gi rnam par rtog pa'i bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //

analyzed: sa bon rnams dbrog ces bya ba ni sngar smos pa'i sa bon rnams kyis 'og nas 'byung ba'i cho ga ltar dug gi mthu dbrog pa'o //

original: dkyil 'khor dbus su gnas pa yi //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dbus su gnas pa yi // zhes bya ba la /

original: dkyil 'khor ni lus so //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor ni lus so //

original: de'i dbus ni snying ga'o //
analyzed: de'i dbus ni snying ga'o //

original: der gnas pa'i ye shes ni yi ge h'um ste /
analyzed: der gnas pa'i ye shes ni yi ge h'um ste /

original: des rnam par shes pa bcing ba ste bsdam par bya ba'o //
analyzed: des rnam par shes pa bcing ba ste bsdam par bya ba'o //

original: yan lag bsrung ba'i sbyor byas nas //
analyzed: yan lag bsrung ba'i sbyor byas nas //

analyzed: de'i 'og phyi rol brtsam par bya // zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: sngar smos pa'i rim gyis dug gis zin pa'i lus dang por bsrungs la /
translated: This means that, according to the previously described procedure, one should first protect the body afflicted by poison,

original: de'i 'og tu phyi'i las brtsam mo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu phyi'i las brtsam mo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: and after that, one should begin the external rites.

original: phyi'i las gsungs pa /🔽chu dang 'o ma bsres pa yis //
analyzed: phyi'i las gsungs pa / chu dang 'o ma bsres pa yis //

analyzed: sa snod yongs su dgang bar bya //

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste ;

analyzed: sa snod ni sa la sogs pa'i bum pa'o //

original: chu dang 'o ma bsres pas dgang ba ni go sla'o //
analyzed: chu dang 'o ma bsres pas dgang ba ni go sla'o //

analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bum pa gang yin pa de'i nang du padma 'dab ma brgyad pa /

original: de'i lte bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
analyzed: de'i lte bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /

analyzed: sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa sems dpa'i skyil krung can /

analyzed: da ni padma'i 'dab ma rnams la gnas pa'i klu rnams bstan par bya ba'i phyir //

analyzed: shar du zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te / shar gyi 'dab ma la ni nor rgyas bu dkar po'o //

original: byang du ni 'jog po ser po'o //
analyzed: byang du ni 'jog po ser po'o //

analyzed: nub tu ni stobs kyi rgyu dmar @157b po'o ;

original: / lhor ni padma sngon po'o //
analyzed: / lhor ni padma sngon po'o //

analyzed: dbang ldan du ni padma chen po dkar ser ro // me mtshams su ni dung skyong dkar sngo'o //

analyzed: bden bral gyi mtshams su ni rigs ldan sngon dmar po //

analyzed: rlung mtshams su ni 'khyil ba ltung ba dmar ser te /

original: de dag ni klu brgyad do //
analyzed: de dag ni klu brgyad do //

original: nye bar bsdu ba bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: nye bar bsdu ba bstan pa'i phyir /

analyzed: klu brgyad bo ni bsams nas su //

analyzed: mgo po rnams ni mnan par bsgom // zhes bya ba smos te /

original: bshad zin to //
analyzed: bshad zin to //
translated: This has been explained.

original: mchod pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mchod pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the worship,🔽he says,

original: rdzas rnams kun gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: rdzas rnams kun gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says with all the substances and so on.

analyzed: rdzas rnams sun ni me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / mar me dang / lha bshos rnams so //
translated: The substances are flowers, incense, perfume, lamps, and food offerings.

original: me tog bdug sogs gtor ma sbyin //
analyzed: me tog bdug sogs gtor ma sbyin //
translated: He says scatter the offerings of flowers, incense, and so on

original: zhes bya ba ni klu'i gtor ma sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni klu'i gtor ma sbyin pa'o //

analyzed: bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor ni //

analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ru bsam // zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: dug dbrog pa'i dus 'dir bdag nyid rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i lha'i rnal 'byor du bya ba'o //
translated: At this time of removing poison, one should do the deity yoga of oneself as Vajra dakini.

analyzed: rma bya'i sgro yi chun po yis // chu yi sbyor bas drang bar bya //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni drangs te chu'i nang du ngo bo ba'o //

original: gang nas drangs she na /🔽kun nas rkang par drangs nas su //
analyzed: gang nas drangs she na / kun nas rkang par drangs nas su //

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /

analyzed: mgo bo la sogs pa'i lus kun ni rma bya'i sgro'i chun pos bya bas la rkang mthil gyi bar du drang ba'o //

analyzed: rkang pa nas ni chur thim bya //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bum pa'i chu snod kyi nang du dbo zhing lha la gsol bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: dug dbrog pa'i sngags gsungs pa /

analyzed: rdo rje sems dpar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /

original: dang por rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor bas /
analyzed: dang por rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor bas /

analyzed: b'a su ki la sogs pa'i sngags thams cad 'bum phrag re rer bzlas pas bsnyen pa bya ba'o //

analyzed: sngags de dag kyang gsungs pa /

analyzed: aom b'a su ki zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste go sla'o //
translated: Oṃ vāsuki and so on. They are easy to understand.

original: dug dbrog pa'i dus su /
analyzed: dug dbrog pa'i dus su /

analyzed: sngags spel ba bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to show the increase of the mantra,🔽[the Bhagavān] declares “vajrasattva” and so on.

analyzed: aom hr'i: tattantar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te / a'a mu ka sya zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa'i don @158a * //

original: gyis drug pa yin no //
analyzed: gyis drug pa yin no //
translated: Of such and such a person is the sixth case in the sense of the second case.

original: kun nas rkang par drangs nas su //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: kun nas rkang par drangs nas su // zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: nye bar bstan par gsungs pa /

original: 'o ma'i dbus su drangs pa yis //
analyzed: 'o ma'i dbus su drangs pa yis //

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: etc.

analyzed: aom b'a su ki hr'i: tattanta ra de ba dattan ni ri ba shyam ru h'um h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a zhes bya ba'i sngags dang / sngags gzhan thams cad kyang zlos shing /
translated: With the mantra Oṃ bāsukī hrīḥ, tat tatantra deva dattaṃ nirviśya ruhuṃ huṃ huṃ huṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā, and with all other mantras,

analyzed: mgo nas brtsams te rkang pa'i bar du byabs nas dvangs la chur dbo bar bya'o //
translated: having anointed from the head down to the feet, the impurities should be washed away with water.

analyzed: pho ba tsam gyis de'i tshe 'phral du 'o ma nag por 'gyur ro // dug 'phrogs nas 'o ma nag por gyur gyi 'og tu bya ba'i sbyor ba bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: At that time, the milk immediately turns black just by the stomach.

original: yungs kar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: yungs kar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In order to show the application of the antidote after the poison has been removed and the milk has turned black, it is said white mustard seeds, etc.

analyzed: dkar po'i sgra ni kun la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The word “white” is to be applied to all [of the following].

original: gsang sngags zlos shing zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gsang sngags zlos shing zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: sngar smos pa'i sngags thams cad zlos shing brdeg pa'o //
translated: means that one should strike while reciting all the mantras mentioned previously.

analyzed: brdeg pa tsam gyis bsgrub bya'i snying 'phar ba la sogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: By merely striking, the heart of the victim will beat, and so forth.

original: de nas ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: de nas ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: Then what should one do?

original: snying ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: snying ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: It is stated, “The heart . . .” and so forth.

original: ye shes bsdams te gzung bar bya //
analyzed: ye shes bsdams te gzung bar bya //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de'i snying gar ye shes te yi ge h'um bsgoms pas rnam par shes pa bcing zhing gzung bar bya'o //
translated: means that by meditating on the syllable hūṃ as the consciousness in the heart of the victim, one should bind and hold the consciousness.

original: de tsam gyis ni dbugs g-yo bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de tsam gyis ni dbugs g-yo bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By that alone, the breath will move.

original: de nas ci zhig bya zhen /🔽dbugs ni rnam par g-yos pa na //
analyzed: de nas ci zhig bya zhen / dbugs ni rnam par g-yos pa na //
translated: Then what should one do?

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /

original: bdag gi dbugs kyis gzir bar bya //
analyzed: bdag gi dbugs kyis gzir bar bya //

translated: The meaning is that one should inhale, that is, draw into one's mouth, the wind from the nose of the self, which is seized by the fangs.

analyzed: de tsam gyis ni rkang lag la sogs pa 'dar bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By that much, the arms and so forth will tremble.

original: de nas ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: de nas ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: Then what should one do?

original: yan lag thams cad 'dar ba na //
analyzed: yan lag thams cad 'dar ba na //
translated: When all the limbs tremble,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: and so forth is stated.

original: bdag nyid dbyangs ni blang bar bya //
analyzed: bdag nyid dbyangs ni blang bar bya //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngags pa bdag nyid kyi glu blang bar bya ba ste /

analyzed: ci zhig ce na h'um gi glu zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: What is it? It is stated: the song of Hum.

original: aom h'um tre na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: aom h'um tre na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Om Hum Trine and so forth.

original: de yang se gol gsum sngon du gtogs la blang ngo zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de yang se gol gsum sngon du gtogs la blang ngo zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: And in order to demonstrate that one should sing that preceded by three snaps of the fingers,

original: se gol gsum gyis blang bar bya //
analyzed: se gol gsum gyis blang bar bya //
translated: one should sing with three snaps of the fingers.

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: is stated.

original: se gol gsum dang bcas pa'i glu blangs pa las mche bas zin pa ldang bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: se gol gsum dang bcas pa'i glu blangs pa las mche bas zin pa ldang bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
