original: lag pa kun du bskor nas su //
analyzed: lag pa kun du bskor nas su //
translated: Circling the hands all around,

original: phyogs brgyad du ni bstan par bya //
analyzed: phyogs brgyad du ni bstan par bya //
translated: one should display in the eight directions.

original: zhes bya ba ni lag pa gnyis padmar bskor zhing phyogs brgyad du sprin rnams la bstan pas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lag pa gnyis padmar bskor zhing phyogs brgyad du sprin rnams la bstan pas /
translated: This means that one should circle the two hands like a lotus and display the clouds in the eight directions.

original: sprin rnams 'gugs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: sprin rnams 'gugs par 'gyur te /
translated: The clouds will be summoned,

original: ji skad du /🔽sngar phyogs brgyad nas ni dgug par bya //
analyzed: ji skad du / sngar phyogs brgyad nas ni dgug par bya //
translated: as it is said:

original: zhes smos pa'i phyir ro //🔽g-yon pa khu tshur bcangs nas su //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i phyag rgya ni go sla'o //
analyzed: zhes smos pa'i phyir ro // g-yon pa khu tshur bcangs nas su // zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i phyag rgya ni go sla'o //
translated: Previously, one should summon from the eight directions.

original: klu'i rgyal po brgyad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni klu brgyad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: klu'i rgyal po brgyad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni klu brgyad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste /
translated: The mudrā called “the eight nāga kings” is the pledge mudrā of the eight nāgas.

original: sngags snga ma dang sbyar la bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: sngags snga ma dang sbyar la bstan par bya'o //
translated: One should display it, combining it with the previous mantra.

original: de bzhin du sprin rnams kyi sngags dang phyag rgya yang dbyer med par sbyar la so sor bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du sprin rnams kyi sngags dang phyag rgya yang dbyer med par sbyar la so sor bstan par bya'o //
translated: Similarly, one should display the mantras and mudrās of the clouds individually, combining them inseparably.

original: aom badzra d'a ki n'i barsha barsha pa ya h'um phu: sv'a h'a zhes bya ba ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i char 'bebs pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: aom badzra d'a ki n'i barsha barsha pa ya h'um phu: sv'a h'a zhes bya ba ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i char 'bebs pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags so //
translated: Oṃ vajra-ḍākinī varṣa varṣaya hūṃ phaṭ svāhā. This is the root mantra of Vajra-ḍākinī for causing rain.

original: 'di klu rnams dang sprin rnams kyi char 'bebs pa'i sngags kyang yin mos kyi /
analyzed: 'di klu rnams dang sprin rnams kyi char 'bebs pa'i sngags kyang yin mos kyi /
translated: This is also the mantra for causing rain from the nāgas and clouds.

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma gtso mo yin pa'i phyir de'i rtsa ba'i sngags su sbyar bar bya'o //🔽sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum phrag ni //
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma gtso mo yin pa'i phyir de'i rtsa ba'i sngags su sbyar bar bya'o // sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum phrag ni //
translated: Since Vajra-ḍākinī is the principal one, her root mantra should be applied.

original: gsum du byas nas bzlas par bya //
analyzed: gsum du byas nas bzlas par bya //
translated: One should recite the mantra after performing the preliminary practice of three hundred thousand times.

original: zhes bya ba ni sngags de nyid kyis sngar bsnyen pa gsum 'bum bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngags de nyid kyis sngar bsnyen pa gsum 'bum bya'o //
translated: This is the preliminary practice of three hundred thousand times with that very mantra.

original: rnal 'byor can gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rnal 'byor can gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The practitioner, etc.

original: 'di rnams zhes bya ba ni sngags 'di rnams kyi sngon du bsnyen pa zhes bya ba dang sbyar te /
analyzed: 'di rnams zhes bya ba ni sngags 'di rnams kyi sngon du bsnyen pa zhes bya ba dang sbyar te /
translated: Here, these refers to the preliminary practice of these mantras.

original: bsnyen pa byas nas las zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor bri ba la sogs ba 'char dbab pa'i las rnams nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba lhag ma yin no //
analyzed: bsnyen pa byas nas las zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor bri ba la sogs ba 'char dbab pa'i las rnams nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba lhag ma yin no //
translated: Having performed the service, the rite called “action” — the rite of descent of the deity into the maṇḍala, and so on — will definitely be accomplished.

original: gzhan yang dge dang sdig pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: gzhan yang dge dang sdig pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Moreover, the signs of good and evil, and so on,🔽are as follows.

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni mtshan @160b ma gzhan te /
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni mtshan @160b ma gzhan te /
translated: Moreover means another sign.

original: sngar smos pa'i rlung gi mtshan ma las gzhan pa pho nya'i mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: sngar smos pa'i rlung gi mtshan ma las gzhan pa pho nya'i mtshan ma'o //
translated: Other than the previously mentioned signs of the vāyu, there are the signs of the messenger.

original: mig yon zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: mig yon zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: The eyes are red, and so on.

original: 'jigs pa'i gos zhes bya ba ni gos nag po'o //
analyzed: 'jigs pa'i gos zhes bya ba ni gos nag po'o //
translated: The terrifying clothes are black clothes.

original: dbyig pa thogs pa ni go bar zad do //
analyzed: dbyig pa thogs pa ni go bar zad do //
translated: The holding of a stick is self-evident.

original: bud med rnams dang 'grogs te 'ong //
analyzed: bud med rnams dang 'grogs te 'ong //
translated: Coming with women

original: zhes bya ba ni bud med dang lhan cig 'grogs te 'ong ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bud med dang lhan cig 'grogs te 'ong ba'o //
translated: means coming with a woman.

original: du ba ni dud mos 'debs pa'o //
analyzed: du ba ni dud mos 'debs pa'o //
translated: Smoke is the smell of burning.

original: skra lhug pa ni skra sil bur bshigs pa'o //
analyzed: skra lhug pa ni skra sil bur bshigs pa'o //
translated: Loose hair is disheveled hair.

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni med pa dang brlag pa la sogs pa'i sgra sgrogs pa'o //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni med pa dang brlag pa la sogs pa'i sgra sgrogs pa'o //
translated: The words “and so on” refer to the sounds of “no” and “lost,” and so on.

original: gcer bu nan gyis smra ba dang // zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gcer bu nan gyis smra ba dang // zhes bya ba la /
translated: Naked, and speaking with force.

original: gcer bu ni gos med pa'o //
analyzed: gcer bu ni gos med pa'o //
translated: Naked means without clothes.

original: nan gyis smra ba ni stobs kyis bkri ba la sogs pa smra ba'o //🔽sbyor bzhis 'chi bar ston pa yin //
analyzed: nan gyis smra ba ni stobs kyis bkri ba la sogs pa smra ba'o // sbyor bzhis 'chi bar ston pa yin //
translated: Speaking with force means speaking with power, leading, and so forth.🔽It is taught that death occurs through four applications.

original: zhes bya ba ni kar dang bi tri ka dang / sva sna dang ka ma na'i sbyor ba bzhi la pho nya 'ongs pa dag ni nad pa 'chi ba nyid du ston pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni kar dang bi tri ka dang / sva sna dang ka ma na'i sbyor ba bzhi la pho nya 'ongs pa dag ni nad pa 'chi ba nyid du ston pa yin no //
translated: The four applications are kar, vitrika, svapna, and kamani.

original: pho nya ji bzhin bdag nyid la //
analyzed: pho nya ji bzhin bdag nyid la //
translated: Having examined oneself just like the messenger,

original: brtag nas rnam pa gnyis su bya //
analyzed: brtag nas rnam pa gnyis su bya //
translated: one should proceed in two ways.

original: zhes bya ba ni pho nya ji lta ba bzhin du bdag nyid la yang sngar smos pa ltar dbugs kyi mtshan ma brtags nas 'grub pa dang mi 'grub pa gnyis la 'gro ba'am mi 'gro ba gnyis su bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni pho nya ji lta ba bzhin du bdag nyid la yang sngar smos pa ltar dbugs kyi mtshan ma brtags nas 'grub pa dang mi 'grub pa gnyis la 'gro ba'am mi 'gro ba gnyis su bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to ;
translated: The meaning is that, just like the messenger, one should examine the signs of the breath as previously mentioned, and proceed or not proceed in two ways, according to whether it is successful or not.

original: / de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: / de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For this very reason,

original: de tshe sngags pa 'gro 'dong na //
analyzed: de tshe sngags pa 'gro 'dong na //
translated: when the mantra practitioner sets out to go,

original: grub pa nyams 'gyur the tshom med //
analyzed: grub pa nyams 'gyur the tshom med //
translated: there is no doubt that accomplishment will decline.

original: ces bya ba smos te /
analyzed: ces bya ba smos te /
translated: This is stated.

original: mtshan ma ngan bzhin du 'gro bar 'dod kyang grub pa nyams pa ste /
analyzed: mtshan ma ngan bzhin du 'gro bar 'dod kyang grub pa nyams pa ste /
translated: Even if one wishes to go to an inauspicious place, one's practice will decline,

original: mi 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mi 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: that is, one will not succeed.

original: bdag gi gdan gyi rab tu byed pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bdag gi gdan gyi rab tu byed pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: This is the topic of the chapter called One's Own Seat.

original: bdag gi gdan ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: bdag gi gdan ni bshad zin to //
translated: One's own seat has been explained.

original: rab tu byed pa zhes bya ba ni gzhung 'dis 'chi ltas rnams shes nas 'chi ba slu ba la sogs pa gsal bar byed pas na rab tu byed pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu byed pa zhes bya ba ni gzhung 'dis 'chi ltas rnams shes nas 'chi ba slu ba la sogs pa gsal bar byed pas na rab tu byed pa'o //
translated: Chapter means that this treatise is a chapter because it clarifies the deception of death, etc., after understanding the signs of death.

original: dpal gdan bzhi pa'i 'grel pa dran pa'i rgyu mtshan zhes bya ba las bdag gi gdan gyi rim par phye ba gnyis pa'o /
analyzed: dpal gdan bzhi pa'i 'grel pa dran pa'i rgyu mtshan zhes bya ba las bdag gi gdan gyi rim par phye ba gnyis pa'o /
translated: This is the second chapter of the commentary called The Reason for Mindfulness on the glorious Chatuhpitha Tantra.

original: // / tha mal pa'i phung po la sogs pa'i yongs su spong ba sngon du 'gro bas lhar bsgom pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: // / tha mal pa'i phung po la sogs pa'i yongs su spong ba sngon du 'gro bas lhar bsgom pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the meditation on the deity preceded by the abandonment of the ordinary aggregates, etc.,

original: stong pa nyid kyi rim par phye ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi rim par phye ba gsungs pa /
translated: the chapter on emptiness is taught.🔽Yoga and so forth.

original: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /🔽rnal 'byor rtsom pa'i @161a * //
analyzed: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /🔽rnal 'byor rtsom pa'i @161a * //
translated: Yoga means

original: khyad par dag / ces bya ba ni lha'i rnal 'byor rtsom pa'i cho ga'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: khyad par dag / ces bya ba ni lha'i rnal 'byor rtsom pa'i cho ga'i khyad par ro //
translated: The special is the special rite for undertaking the yoga of the deity.

original: gang gi sngags rnams 'tshal bar bgyi //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gang gi sngags rnams 'tshal bar bgyi // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: By what means do you know the mantras?

original: sngags rnams ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi //🔽zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽ye shes gzung ba ji ltar lags //
analyzed: sngags rnams ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi // zhes bya ba'i don to // ye shes gzung ba ji ltar lags //
translated: means How do you know the mantras?

original: zhes bya ba ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub kyi mtshan ma'i ye shes gzung ba ste /🔽ji ltar sems la brlan par bgyi //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub kyi mtshan ma'i ye shes gzung ba ste / ji ltar sems la brlan par bgyi //
translated: means How do you know the wisdom of the signs of the powers such as pacification?

original: zhes bya ba ni /🔽bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni / bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal //
translated: means How do you moisten the mind?

original: zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: means We wish to hear from the Blessed One.

original: lan gsungs pa nyon cig ces bya ba la sogs pa la de kho na zhes bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa'o //
analyzed: lan gsungs pa nyon cig ces bya ba la sogs pa la de kho na zhes bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa'o //
translated: The reply is Listen! and so forth. The reality is the non-erroneous.

original: lha'i bdag nyid ces bya ba ni bdag lha'i bsgom pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: lha'i bdag nyid ces bya ba ni bdag lha'i bsgom pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: The deity nature is the nature of the deity meditation on oneself.

original: yang na bdag nyid lhar bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang na bdag nyid lhar bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Or it is for the purpose of making oneself into a deity.

original: nyon cig ces bya ba ni 'og nas 'byung ba rnams mnyan pa'i phyir gdams pa'o //
analyzed: nyon cig ces bya ba ni 'og nas 'byung ba rnams mnyan pa'i phyir gdams pa'o //
translated: Listen! is the instruction to listen to what follows.

original: mnyan par bya ba de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: mnyan par bya ba de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: He states what is to be listened to:

original: dang por zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /🔽dang por zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dang por zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / dang por zhes bya ba ni /
translated: First, etc.

original: lhar bsgoms pa'i dang po ste /
analyzed: lhar bsgoms pa'i dang po ste /
translated: First is the beginning of the meditation on the deity.

original: dus dang por der lus stong pa nyid du bsgoms nas de'i 'og tu lhar bsgom mo zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽lus can dri ma bkru bar bya //
analyzed: dus dang por der lus stong pa nyid du bsgoms nas de'i 'og tu lhar bsgom mo zhes bya ba'i don to // lus can dri ma bkru bar bya //
translated: The meaning is that, having first meditated on the body as emptiness, one should then meditate on the deity.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: One should wash the stains of embodied beings.

original: dri ma ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la sogs par mngon par zhen pa'o //
analyzed: dri ma ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la sogs par mngon par zhen pa'o //
translated: Stains are the attachments to subject and object, etc.

original: dri ma de stong pa nyid kyis bkrus nas lhar bsgom mo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dri ma de stong pa nyid kyis bkrus nas lhar bsgom mo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that, having washed those stains with emptiness, one should meditate on the deity.

original: de nyid bshad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid bshad pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to explain that, he says:

original: dang po gzugs ni stong sogs bya //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: dang po gzugs ni stong sogs bya // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: First, the form is made empty, etc.

original: btsugs shing brtags pas na gzugs te phung po lnga'o //
analyzed: btsugs shing brtags pas na gzugs te phung po lnga'o //
translated: Form is the five aggregates, because they are established and investigated.

original: stong pa zhes bya ba ni gzugs de'i rang bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa zhes bya ba ni gzugs de'i rang bzhin nyid do //
translated: Empty is the nature of that form.

original: sogs pa'i tshig gis na mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa gzung bar bya ste /
analyzed: sogs pa'i tshig gis na mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa gzung bar bya ste /
translated: The words “and so on” are to be understood as referring to the signless and the wishless.

original: gzugs de'i ngo bo nyid dang mtshan ma dang rnam par rtog pa rnams rang bzhin med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzugs de'i ngo bo nyid dang mtshan ma dang rnam par rtog pa rnams rang bzhin med pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the intrinsic reality, the sign, and the conceptualization of that form are essenceless,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum du bsgom mo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum du bsgom mo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: one should cultivate the three doors of liberation. This is the meaning.

original: phung po lnga 'ba' zhig rnam par thar ba'i sgo gsum gyis sbyang bar ma zad kyi /
analyzed: phung po lnga 'ba' zhig rnam par thar ba'i sgo gsum gyis sbyang bar ma zad kyi /
translated: Not only is the purification of the five aggregates by the three doors of liberation taught,

original: gzhan yang bsdu bar bstan pa'i phyir /🔽ji sring bco brgyad yid nyid de //
analyzed: gzhan yang bsdu bar bstan pa'i phyir / ji sring bco brgyad yid nyid de //
translated: but also in order to demonstrate the inclusion of other things,

original: zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: it says, “as long as there are eighteen, they are just mind.”

original: ji srid ces bya ba ni bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: ji srid ces bya ba ni bsdu ba'o //
translated: “As long as” is inclusive.

original: gang zhe na /
analyzed: gang zhe na /
translated: What is included?🔽The six sense spheres, the six sense objects,

original: mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ces @161b bya ba dang dbang po'i khams drug dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang ro dang reg bya dang / chos zhes bya ba yul drug dang /
analyzed: mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ces @161b bya ba dang dbang po'i khams drug dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang ro dang reg bya dang / chos zhes bya ba yul drug dang /
translated: and the six sense consciousnesses.

original: de dag la brten te skyes pa'i rnam par shes pa'i khams drug drug ste /
analyzed: de dag la brten te skyes pa'i rnam par shes pa'i khams drug drug ste /
translated: The six elements of consciousness arise in dependence on those, thus there are eighteen elements.

original: bco brgyad po de dag kyang snga ma ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyis sbyang ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bco brgyad po de dag kyang snga ma ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyis sbyang ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Those eighteen elements should be purified by the three doors of liberation, as before.

original: yid nyid de zhes bya ba ni de dag nye bar brtags na tshad mar gyur pa ni /
analyzed: yid nyid de zhes bya ba ni de dag nye bar brtags na tshad mar gyur pa ni /
translated: The mind itself is the only valid cognition when they are examined.

original: rang gi sems 'ba' zhig go zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang gi sems 'ba' zhig go zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is only one's own mind.

original: gal te phyi rol na don yod du zin kyang /
analyzed: gal te phyi rol na don yod du zin kyang /
translated: Even if external objects exist,

original: de dag rnam par gzhag pa ni sems 'ba' zhig la rag las pa yin te /
analyzed: de dag rnam par gzhag pa ni sems 'ba' zhig la rag las pa yin te /
translated: their establishment depends solely on the mind,

original: de ni rang gi dang gis gsal zhing thams cad nyams su myong btsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni rang gi dang gis gsal zhing thams cad nyams su myong btsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is naturally clear and merely experiences everything.

original: da ni stong pa nyid kyi bye brag bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni stong pa nyid kyi bye brag bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the distinctions of emptiness,

original: gzugs khams zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gzugs khams zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says form realm and so on.

original: gzugs zhes bya ba ni dkar po dang ser po dang / ring po dang / thung du la sogs pa mig gi yul du gyur pa rnams te bkra ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs zhes bya ba ni dkar po dang ser po dang / ring po dang / thung du la sogs pa mig gi yul du gyur pa rnams te bkra ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Form is the object of the eye, such as blue, yellow, long, short, and so on, because it is visible.

original: de nyid rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir khams te gzugs kyang yin la khams kyang yin pas na gzugs khams so //
analyzed: de nyid rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir khams te gzugs kyang yin la khams kyang yin pas na gzugs khams so //
translated: It is the element because it holds its own characteristics. It is both form and an element, thus it is the form element.

original: stong pa zhes bya ba ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i ngo bo nyid de de yang 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i snang ba yin pas /
analyzed: stong pa zhes bya ba ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i ngo bo nyid de de yang 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i snang ba yin pas /
translated: Emptiness is the nature free from the grasped and the grasper. It is like this: it is the appearance of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa las tha dad pa'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pas stong pa yin gyi /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa las tha dad pa'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pas stong pa yin gyi /
translated: It is empty of the grasped and the grasper, which are different from consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i snang bas ni ma yin te chu zla bzhin no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i snang bas ni ma yin te chu zla bzhin no //
translated: It is not empty of the appearance of consciousness, like the reflection of the moon in water.

original: chu zla yang zla ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong gi / chu zla nyid kyang med pa ma yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: chu zla yang zla ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong gi / chu zla nyid kyang med pa ma yin pa bzhin no //
translated: The reflection of the moon is empty of the nature of the moon, but it is not non-existent.

original: ci gzugs la sogs pa'i khams snang ba las tha dad par yod dam zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: ci gzugs la sogs pa'i khams snang ba las tha dad par yod dam zhe na ma yin te /
translated: Do the elements of form and so on exist separately from appearance? No, they do not.

original: de nyid brtag mi bzod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid brtag mi bzod pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it cannot bear investigation.

original: chu zla ltar bden pa dang brdzun pa'i tha snyad dang bral ba'i phyir de nyid de ltar brjod do //
analyzed: chu zla ltar bden pa dang brdzun pa'i tha snyad dang bral ba'i phyir de nyid de ltar brjod do //
translated: Like a reflection in water, it is free from the conventions of truth and falsity.

original: de nyid du ni sgra yang bya //
analyzed: de nyid du ni sgra yang bya //
translated: Sound is also like that.

original: zhes bya ba ni sgra'i khams kyang de ltar gzung ba la sogs pas stong pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sgra'i khams kyang de ltar gzung ba la sogs pas stong pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the sound element is also empty of apprehended object, apprehending subject, and so on.

original: 'di ltar gzhan la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar gzhan la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: This should be applied in the same way to the others.

original: de nyid du ni gzugs kyang bya //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de nyid du ni gzugs kyang bya // zhes bya ba la /
translated: Form is also like that.

original: rig cing nyams su myong bas na gzugs te bde ba'i ngo bo nyid chos kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyi yul lo //
analyzed: rig cing nyams su myong bas na gzugs te bde ba'i ngo bo nyid chos kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyi yul lo //
translated: Form is that which is cognized and experienced, the object of the nature of pleasure, the nature of the element of phenomena.

original: yul rnams kyi rjes la mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams stong par bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yul rnams kyi rjes la mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams stong par bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: After the objects, in order to teach the emptiness of the faculties such as the eyes,

original: @162a * // mig gi bdag nyid stong pa la //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: @162a * // mig gi bdag nyid stong pa la // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The eyes are empty of the nature of the eyes.

original: mig la sogs pa yang brtags na 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mig la sogs pa yang brtags na 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin med pa'i phyir /
translated: The eyes and so on are also empty when examined, because they do not have the nature of apprehending and so on.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi ngo bo nyid do //
translated: The nature of the three gates of liberation.🔽If they do not exist, how can the consciousnesses that arise in dependence on them exist?

original: de dag med na de dag la brten te skye ba'i rnam par shes pa rnams kyang ji ltar yod de stong pa nyid la sogs pa'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de dag med na de dag la brten te skye ba'i rnam par shes pa rnams kyang ji ltar yod de stong pa nyid la sogs pa'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach emptiness, etc.,

original: dbus na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: dbus na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: he says, “The middle is not imagined,” etc.

original: dbus su ci ltar brtag par bya //
analyzed: dbus su ci ltar brtag par bya //
translated: How can the middle be imagined?

original: zhes bya ba ni dbus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ji ltar gzung bar bya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dbus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ji ltar gzung bar bya ste /
translated: How can the nature of the middle consciousness be apprehended?

original: 'di dag thams cad ni sems kyi brtags pa tsam mo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad ni sems kyi brtags pa tsam mo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: All of this is merely the imagination of mind.

original: de nyid la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir snang ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsungs pa yid ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de nyid la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir snang ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsungs pa yid ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In order to enter into that, he teaches the samādhi of non-appearance, saying “The mind,” etc.

original: yid ces bya ba ni rnam par rig pa'o //
analyzed: yid ces bya ba ni rnam par rig pa'o //
translated: “Mind” means consciousness.

original: nam mkhar thim nas zhes bya ba ni yi ge h'um gi me 'bar bas thams cad bsregs te /
analyzed: nam mkhar thim nas zhes bya ba ni yi ge h'um gi me 'bar bas thams cad bsregs te /
translated: “Dissolving into space” means that everything is burned by the fire of the syllable hūṃ.

original: thal ba tsam yang med par byas pas snang ba med par thim pa'o //
analyzed: thal ba tsam yang med par byas pas snang ba med par thim pa'o //
translated: Since it is made so that not even an atom remains, it dissolves into the non-appearance.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /🔽thams cad stong par bsam par bya //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir / thams cad stong par bsam par bya //
translated: For that very reason,🔽it is said:

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: “One should think of everything as empty.”

original: mdor bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: mdor bsdus pa'o //
translated: This is in brief.

original: bstan pa de nyid bshad pa'i phyir //
analyzed: bstan pa de nyid bshad pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to explain that very teaching,

original: gling dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te //
analyzed: gling dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te //
translated: he says “the continents” and so forth.

original: sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni rgya mtsho dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i bar du gzung ngo //
analyzed: sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni rgya mtsho dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i bar du gzung ngo //
translated: The word “and so forth” includes up to the wind maṇḍala and the ocean maṇḍala.

original: steng zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' la spyod pa'o //
analyzed: steng zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' la spyod pa'o //
translated: “Above” means moving in the sky.

original: 'og ces bya ba ni sa 'og na spyod pa'o //
analyzed: 'og ces bya ba ni sa 'og na spyod pa'o //
translated: “Below” means moving underground.

original: bar zhes bya ba ni sa steng na spyod pa ste /
analyzed: bar zhes bya ba ni sa steng na spyod pa ste /
translated: “In between” means moving on the earth.

original: 'jig rten gsum po de nyid ni khams gsum mo //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum po de nyid ni khams gsum mo //
translated: That very “three worlds” is the three realms.

original: thams cad ces bya ba ni snod dang bcud kyi dbye ba rnam pa gnyis so //
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba ni snod dang bcud kyi dbye ba rnam pa gnyis so //
translated: “Everything” is the twofold division of the environment and its inhabitants.

original: nye bar bsdu ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: nye bar bsdu ba gsungs pa /
translated: The summary is stated:

original: phyogs bcu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste go sla'o //
analyzed: phyogs bcu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste go sla'o //
translated: “The ten directions” and so forth is easy to understand.

original: de ltar dngos po thams cad so sor bshig nas bdag nyid kyang nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid du bya ba'i phyir /🔽bdag gi dngos po zad par bya //
analyzed: de ltar dngos po thams cad so sor bshig nas bdag nyid kyang nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid du bya ba'i phyir / bdag gi dngos po zad par bya //
translated: Thus, having destroyed all things individually, in order to make the self the nature of space,

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: he says, “I will destroy the reality of the self.”

original: mthar bdag gi lus kyi gzugs la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa bsregs pas bshig nas snang ba med par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽dngos po 'dres pa dmigs par bya //
analyzed: mthar bdag gi lus kyi gzugs la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa bsregs pas bshig nas snang ba med par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to // dngos po 'dres pa dmigs par bya //
translated: The meaning is that in the end, having burned up the conceptualization of the form of one’s body, etc., one should destroy it and make it disappear.

original: zhes bya ba ni dngos po'i yul ma lus ba nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyi ror ro gcig tu bsres nas dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dngos po'i yul ma lus ba nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyi ror ro gcig tu bsres nas dmigs pa ste /
translated: “One should observe the mixture of things” means that having mixed all the objects of things into one taste in the essence of space, one should observe them.

original: lhar bsgom par bya'o @162b zhes bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: lhar bsgom par bya'o @162b zhes bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should meditate on them as deities.

original: rnal 'byor pas zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor can no //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor can no //
translated: “The yogī” means the practitioner.

original: mkhas pas zhes bya ba ni gzung ba la sogs pa stong pa'i blo can no //
analyzed: mkhas pas zhes bya ba ni gzung ba la sogs pa stong pa'i blo can no //
translated: “The wise” means the one whose mind is empty of apprehended objects, etc.

original: ye shes gzung ba ci ltar lags //
analyzed: ye shes gzung ba ci ltar lags //
translated: How is the wisdom apprehended?

original: zhes bya ba'i lan bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i lan bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the answer to that,

original: mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The equality of the three times, etc.

original: 'das ma thag pa'i tshul gyis nam mkhar thim pa'i stong pa nyid bsams nas de'i dbus su de snang ba med pa'i rang bzhin la bltas nas zhes bya ba ni ye shes gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'das ma thag pa'i tshul gyis nam mkhar thim pa'i stong pa nyid bsams nas de'i dbus su de snang ba med pa'i rang bzhin la bltas nas zhes bya ba ni ye shes gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Having contemplated the emptiness of space, which dissolves in the manner just described, one should look at the nature of its non-appearance in the middle of that, i.e., one should apprehend the gnosis.

original: de ni mtshan ma brtag par bya //
analyzed: de ni mtshan ma brtag par bya //
translated: One should examine the signs there.

original: zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes der zhi ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub kyi mtshan ma ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes der zhi ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub kyi mtshan ma ste /
translated: The signs of the powers of peace, etc., of that gnosis of emptiness are the omens.

original: ltas brtags pa ste dpyad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ltas brtags pa ste dpyad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: One should examine them, i.e., one should investigate them.

original: yang na mtshan ma nyid ye shes te /
analyzed: yang na mtshan ma nyid ye shes te /
translated: Or else, the signs themselves are the gnosis,

original: 'dis zhi ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub shes par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dis zhi ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub shes par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they make one know the powers of peace, etc.

original: der zhes bya ba ni dus de'i tshe'o //
analyzed: der zhes bya ba ni dus de'i tshe'o //
translated: There, at that time.

original: de nyid gsungs pha mar me zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang gi tshe mar me lta bu'i 'od snang ba de'i tshe zhi ba'i las 'grub par shes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pha mar me zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang gi tshe mar me lta bu'i 'od snang ba de'i tshe zhi ba'i las 'grub par shes par bya ba'o //
translated: The light of the lamp is the light of the flame.

original: dmar po rdul gyis rgyas par 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dmar po rdul gyis rgyas par 'gyur // zhes bya ba la /
translated: When it is red, that is, when it is filled with red particles,

original: rdul ni 'od do //
analyzed: rdul ni 'od do //
translated: the light is the flame.

original: rgyas pa ni rgyas par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rgyas pa ni rgyas par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The filling is the filling with red particles.🔽 The sun is the sun.🔽 The moon is the moon.

original: nyi ma'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o /
analyzed: nyi ma'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o /
translated: The stars are the stars.🔽 The smoke is the smoke.🔽 The mist is the mist.🔽 The cloud is the cloud.🔽 The rain is the rain.🔽 The lightning is the lightning.🔽 The thunder is the thunder.🔽 The wind is the wind.🔽 The fire is the fire.🔽 The earth is the earth.🔽 The water is the water.🔽 The fire is the fire.🔽 The wind is the wind.🔽 The space is the space.

original: chags pa'i las zhes bya ba ni dbang du bya ba'o //
analyzed: chags pa'i las zhes bya ba ni dbang du bya ba'o //
translated: The consciousness is the consciousness.🔽 The form is the form.🔽 The sound is the sound.🔽 The smell is the smell.🔽 The taste is the taste.

original: sogs pa'i tshig gis na dgug pa dang / mnan pa la sogs pa gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: sogs pa'i tshig gis na dgug pa dang / mnan pa la sogs pa gzung bar bya'o //
translated: The touch is the touch.🔽 The dharma is the dharma.

original: mthar ni du ba gnag mthong na //
analyzed: mthar ni du ba gnag mthong na //
translated: The eye is the eye.🔽 The ear is the ear.

original: zhes bya ba la /🔽mthar te ting nge 'dzin gyi mthar du ba ltar gnag pa mthong na'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la / mthar te ting nge 'dzin gyi mthar du ba ltar gnag pa mthong na'o //
translated: The nose is the nose.🔽 The tongue is the tongue.

original: mngon spyod du ni rab tu grags //
analyzed: mngon spyod du ni rab tu grags //
translated: The body is the body.

original: zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
translated: The mind is the mind.🔽 The form is the form.🔽 The sound is the sound.

original: rlung gi mdog ltar 'khrugs pa yis //
analyzed: rlung gi mdog ltar 'khrugs pa yis //
translated: The smell is the smell.🔽 The taste is the taste.🔽 The touch is the touch.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The dharma is the dharma.🔽 The eye consciousness is the eye consciousness.🔽 The ear consciousness is the ear consciousness.

original: rlung gi mdog ltar sngo la lang long du 'khrugs pa'o //
analyzed: rlung gi mdog ltar sngo la lang long du 'khrugs pa'o //
translated: The nose consciousness is the nose consciousness.🔽 The tongue consciousness is the tongue consciousness.🔽 The body consciousness is the body

original: de yi mod la bskrad par 'gyur //
analyzed: de yi mod la bskrad par 'gyur //
translated: and immediately they are expelled.

original: zhes bya ba yang go sla'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba yang go sla'o //
translated: This is easy to understand.

original: zla ba dkar po'i 'od zer ltar //
analyzed: zla ba dkar po'i 'od zer ltar //
translated: Like the light rays of the white moon,

original: zhes bya ba ni 'od shin tu dkar ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'od shin tu dkar ba'o //
translated: means with very white light.

original: thams cad du zhes bya ba ni yun ring du'o //
analyzed: thams cad du zhes bya ba ni yun ring du'o //
translated: Everywhere means for a long time.

original: rnal 'byor grub par shes par bya //
analyzed: rnal 'byor grub par shes par bya //
translated: One should know the accomplishment of yoga.

original: zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
translated: This is easy to understand.

original: ci zhig ce na /🔽blo ldan 'gro ba yang dag gnas //
analyzed: ci zhig ce na / blo ldan 'gro ba yang dag gnas //
translated: What is it?

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The wise one is rightly situated in the world.

original: 'dis ni 'gro ba rnams kyi dngos po 'das ba dang ma 'ongs pa la sogs pa shes par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽da ni stong pa nyid kyi rjes la lha @163a * //
analyzed: 'dis ni 'gro ba rnams kyi dngos po 'das ba dang ma 'ongs pa la sogs pa shes par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // da ni stong pa nyid kyi rjes la lha @163a * //
translated: This means that one will know the past, future, etc. , of the world.

original: bsgom pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: bsgom pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the meditation on the deity after emptiness,

original: de 'og ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de 'og ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “After that, etc. ”

original: de 'og ces bya ba ni stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i mthar /
analyzed: de 'og ces bya ba ni stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i mthar /
translated: After that means after the meditation on emptiness.

original: rnal 'byor las byung ba zhes bya ba ni lha'i rnal 'byor du bskyed ba'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor las byung ba zhes bya ba ni lha'i rnal 'byor du bskyed ba'o //
translated: Arisen from yoga means generated in the yoga of the deity.

original: gang gi zhen /
analyzed: gang gi zhen /
translated: Whose?

original: myu gu la sogs mtshon par bsam//
analyzed: myu gu la sogs mtshon par bsam//
translated: One should think of the illustration of the sprout, etc.

original: zhes bya ba la stong pa nyid kyis sbyangs pa'i lus kyi zhing sa la lha'i sa bon dang sku'i myu gu'i rim gyis bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la stong pa nyid kyis sbyangs pa'i lus kyi zhing sa la lha'i sa bon dang sku'i myu gu'i rim gyis bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should generate the seed of the deity and the sprout of the body in the field of the body purified by emptiness.

original: de nyid ni yang dang yang du ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid ni yang dang yang du ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: This is taught again and again.

original: 'dir ni phyogs tsam zhig gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dir ni phyogs tsam zhig gsungs pa yin te /
translated: Here, only a part is taught.

original: dngos po'i yul thams cad stong pa nyid du skad cig gnyis la sogs pa'i bar du rnal 'byor pa gal te gnas par gyur na /🔽lha'i sa bon la sogs pa'i rim gyis /
analyzed: dngos po'i yul thams cad stong pa nyid du skad cig gnyis la sogs pa'i bar du rnal 'byor pa gal te gnas par gyur na / lha'i sa bon la sogs pa'i rim gyis /
translated: If the yogī abides for two moments, etc., in the emptiness of all things,🔽then the result of knowing the past and future, etc.

original: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa shes pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu smin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni man ngag go //
analyzed: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa shes pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu smin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni man ngag go //
translated: will ripen through the stages of the seed of the deity, etc. This is the esoteric instruction.

original: stong pa nyid ma gtogs par lha'i rnal 'byor 'ba' zhig gis skyon cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: stong pa nyid ma gtogs par lha'i rnal 'byor 'ba' zhig gis skyon cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If one practices only the yoga of the deity without emptiness, what is the fault?

original: gang zhig stong zhes bsgom pa ni //
analyzed: gang zhig stong zhes bsgom pa ni //
translated: One who meditates on emptiness

original: myur du sems dpa' grol bar 'gyur //
analyzed: myur du sems dpa' grol bar 'gyur //
translated: will quickly be liberated as a hero.

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: This is the meaning.

original: gang zhig ces bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig ces bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: “Whoever” refers to the yogi/nī.

original: stong zhes zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid bsgoms nas so //
analyzed: stong zhes zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid bsgoms nas so //
translated: “Emptiness” refers to having meditated on emptiness.

original: bsgom pa zhes bya ba ni lhar bsgoms nas so //
analyzed: bsgom pa zhes bya ba ni lhar bsgoms nas so //
translated: “Meditation” refers to having meditated on the deity.

original: de ni myur du grol bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de ni myur du grol bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: He/she will be quickly liberated, not otherwise.

original: sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni sems so //
analyzed: sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni sems so //
translated: “Mind” refers to the mind.

original: yang na phyag na rdo rje la bod pa'o //
analyzed: yang na phyag na rdo rje la bod pa'o //
translated: Alternatively, it refers to Vajrapāṇi.
